column5: Any body put a power handle on a C3 6500 reel? i was thinking of doing that this year and thought that it might help with big bladed lures.
I installed them on both C3,C4. the reel performs a lot better. The handles are not cheap. If I remember, $20.00 each.
$20 each sounds about right. I'll second that the reel performs much better. It's a good investment.
